entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 9 - X509CertificateLoader.LoadPkcs12 - private key throws error on certificate load #109881
  • [DAC] ISOSDacInterface:GetMethodDescData reads from nullptr #109877
  • [browser] Change default boot.json name #109876
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span on SpanSplitEnumerator #109874
  • Possible System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource trimming issue #109872
    8.0.x
  • [wasm] chrome-DebuggerTests crashing with DeadLetter #109870
  • Contains extension method on arrays is resolved from MemoryExtensions instead of Linq breaking EF queries #109869
  • Custom JsonConverter breaks context variable in JsonSchemaExporterOptions.TransformSchemaNode callback #109868
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109867
  • Internal CLR error 0x80131506 when running the test for System.Private.CoreLib #109865
  • WASM AOT fails with regex in .NET 9 #109862
    9.0.x
  • System.Management 9.0.0 throws an exception #109860
  • [API Proposal]: More `MemoryExtension` methods accepting `SearchValues<T>` #109859
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Version 9.0: UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups() throws System.UriFormatException: Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed. #109858
  • JsonSerializerContext generated source breaks for property named "@event" #109854
    Future

Closed

  • [Proposal] Vectorized System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<K, V> #108098
    Future
  • Introduce a 'lazy' TextReader #34529
  • window.Module.FS and IDBFS no longer works in .NET 9 #109810
    9.0.0
  • [Help] [RISC-V] GC crash on System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceTest.AllSubscriberStress #105808
    Future
  • iOS UI Culture for Localisation #108753
  • DriveInfo constructor does not accept nonexistent path on Linux, only Windows #26081
  • Support PInvoke exports via regular LoadLibrary/etc. without setting up runtime first #3750
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix obtaining type handles of IDynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation #109875
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Simplify usage of TestPlaceholderTarget in tests #109873
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Disable some chrome-DebuggerTests that are crashing with DeadLetter #109871
    area-Debugger-mono
  • fix(wasm): proper library detection for browserwasm and wasi #109866
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add floating point config support in GC #109863
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Numerical ordering for string compare/equals/hashcode #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix failing test on NativeAOT #109853
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Use current STJ in HostModel and remove unnecessary audit suppressions #109852
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #109880
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Revert "Merging internal commits for release/6.0" #109878
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #109743
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109723
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • [wasm] Use correct current runtime pack version for Wasm.Build.Tests #109836
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Delete reflection-free mode #109857
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #109830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix native aot outerloop #109849
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [cdac] Implement `ExecutionManager.ReadyToRunJitManager.GetMethodInfo` (minus handling of hot/cold lookup) #109766
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Relax cost improvement assert in 3-opt layout #109835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Docs updates #109808
    needs-area-label
  • Add SseFormatter #109832
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [WASI] throw PNSE in `ManualResetEventSlim.Wait` #109839
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] add trailing header support to WasiHTTPHandler #109840
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] Skip signal handler registration on WASI #109838
    arch-wasm, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [RuntimeAsync] Validate and fix support for arm64, x86 and arm32 #2764

PullRequests

Created

  • Status and incomplete fat `Precode` pointer. #2780
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • [SwiftBindings] Binding process doc #2779
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] added full demangling results with easy accessors and cleaned up the code to require fewer allocations #2761
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] only require EMSDK when building for browser #2775
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [RuntimeAsync] Add arm32 support #2773
    area-async

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] update `SharedLibrary` smoke test for WASIp2 #2778
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [SwiftBindings] Document generic methods #2771
    area-SwiftBindings
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasm separate DWARF debug to different file #2264
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Irrelevant nuget.config on parent directory makes build failure on project directory #44897
  • Microsoft.NET.Publish.Tests.dll.5 is timing out a lot, imbalance with other partitions #44895
  • dotnet format: "The build host could not be found" after updating VS to .NET SDK 9 #44893
  • Investigate Publish60Hosted_Works not using the live runtime dependencies #44886

Closed

  • dotnet restore on a solution file only restores one project #44884
  • Support tests sharding natively #42986
  • SDK doesn't find/use bundled library-packs when additional NuGet sources are specified. #44547

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove eventlistener guard #44896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update SB dev container image #44892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix updating KnownWebAssemblySdkPack when creating test layout #44888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick 44859 into release/9.0.2xx: Fix failing tests because of "UseUwpTools" property #44882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [dotnet-watch] Separate build from run #44699
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix images used for helix tests in CI #44850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB dev container image #44871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • tool-install: Avoid duplicate sources #44853
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2582920 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [donet-watch] Update to new Roslyn APIs #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions and to GA #44834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Casting a literal `true` or `false` to a function pointer crashes csc.exe #75933
  • `InteractiveHostDesktopTests.Bitness` test fails on VS 17.12 #75932

Closed

  • Secondary dashed line appears in raw string literals #59598
    Backlog
  • Typing <enter> in single-line raw string literal should convert it to multiline. #59347
    Backlog
  • Comment Selection command doesn't work in .editorconfig file #60073
    Backlog
  • Imperfect IEnumerable<T> -> Span<T> collection expression conversion #71755
    Backlog
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (IEnumerable<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71296
    Backlog
  • incorrect fix prompt for unreachable code #75929
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35514.242 #75931
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35514.35 #75927

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations by creating an array builder class that allows span usage #75940
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add server side support for refreshing source generated files #75939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use auto properties #75936
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Send over the new sourcetext's content checksum when sending notification of textchanges #75928
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Add params vs normal form test #75937
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Do not show structure guides on raw string literals #75938
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Convert single-line raw strings into multi-line on pressing <enter> #75648
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix UpdateBaseline failure when no valid change has been made before baseline update #75934
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Optimize single spread of IEnumerable to array #75847
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75935
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Update .NET 9 runtime for single machine CI job #75889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify shape of APIs used for Overload Resolution Priority feature #75891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, Next
  • Update parsing code for conditional access expressions #75849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure NFW gets reported before result is reported to client and remove async listener in queue #75907
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable TypeDefinitionProvider LSP capability #75819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Reduce IVsFreeThreadedFileChangeEvents2.DirectoryChangedEx2 notifications from VS shell #75815
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear hoisted locals when disposing iterator and async-iterator state machines #75908
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, 17.13 P2
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity Api Endpoint Route Builder Extensions #58994
  • Range Attribute to specify a value inside an array max/min lengths #58993
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query #58992
  • Perf improvement: caching, json #58991
  • Errors after updating packages #58990
  • AddOpenIdConnect not properly parsing Token Claims from OIDC Providers #58989
  • Form Databinding Not working correctly with Nested object - Static SSR form submission #58988
  • MapStaticAssets doesn't work with WebApplication.CreateSlimBuilder #58986
  • When building the entire aspnetcore repo (i.e. inside the VMR) desktop msbuild is chosen #58985
  • -BuildManaged -BuildInstallers doesn't work as installer build too early #58984
  • Blazor Server "Error: Invocation canceled due to the underlying connection being closed" when trying to change base path #58981
  • 'IServiceCollection' does not contain a definition for 'AddIdentity' and no accessible extension method 'AddIdentity' #58979
  • Blazor web app with Fallback authentication and disabled prerendering doesn't load content of anonymous pages #58978
  • RendererInfo causes "SyntaxError: Unexpected end of JSON input" #58977
  • Static Web Assets with Finger Printing in Razor Class Libraries not supported? #58976
  • MSB4018: The "DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly. #58975
  • [Razor class library (RCL)] Enable the automatic import of arbitrary CSS files into consumer project. #58974
  • Razor regression in ASP .NET Core 9.0 #58973
  • [Bug] Redis SignalR Backplane completely fails InteractiveServer components #58971
  • Generate a competent Project Lead model that will solve the naming and documentation issues. #58969
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI produces lots of duplicate schemas for the same object #58968

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #58941
  • Perf regression: mvc #58972
  • Dotnet 9.0 scaffolding no longer works - errors when doing NavigationManager.NavigateTo in Create.razor #58951
  • [Bug] .NET9 SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor cannot start app #58983
  • Screen reader is not announcing error when required "Title", "Genre" and "Rating" fields kept blank: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_ScreenReader #56284
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58961
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, json #58883
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #58928
  • InteractiveServer SignalR Redis Backplane does not work #58078
  • .NET 9 - Blazor Web App - Global Server Rendering with Individual Accounts not working #58967
  • Using Blazor Web App template in dotnet 8. Upload component doesn't fire "onChange" event #58729
  • Issue: preventDefault Not Working in Blazor Interactive WebAssembly Events in .NET 8 #58718
  • Compile Fails in 2022 Preview but works in 2022 #58748

PullRequests

Created

  • Put package assets in TFM-specific folder #58995
    area-mvc
  • Build installers at the end of the repo build #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

Updated

  • Address variable initialization warnings in ANCM (C26494) #58904
    area-networking
  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24560.6 #58862
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update Weather.razor #58955
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with IsGrouped="True" - RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not Firing #25889
  • Visual Studio 17.12 and .NET 8 requires XCode 16 #25888
  • ContentPresenter just rendering component string in .Net9 #25887
  • [iOS] Command event spills to parent if child command is busy (when ICommand CanExecute is false) #25885
  • WMC1006 compile error for Windows MAUI .NET 9 project when referencing Microsoft.Identity.Client.Desktop #25883
  • [BUG] Memory Leak using SkiaBitmapExportContext #25881
  • iOS 18.0+ Maui bug with MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync #25879
  • Use Configuration.StartsWith('Debug') instead of Configuration == 'Debug' for Debug specific build settings #25874

Closed

  • AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #25890
  • Group Collection View - Expected dequeued view to be returned to the collection view in preparation for display #25878
  • In windows and ios the RequestedThemeChanged event only fires the first time. #25864
  • After updating Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility to version 9.0.0, I am facing issues with the handlers in MauiProgram.cs file #25850
  • [Android] App hangs on splash after clearing data/cache #25876
  • Default configurations for Debug and Release mode #25675
  • "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." when using a Preferences.Default.Get in MAUI #25676

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25886
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Moved a UI test to the proper place #25877
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [ci] Fix the internal build and update arcade #25875
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border

  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770

  • Source Generation for XAML #24865

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Encoding webview's source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand of CarouselView is not triggered #25574
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Regression] "Table not found with alias" for column access inside subquery predicate #35118
  • No coercion operator is defined between nullable and not nullable type after upgrade from EFCore8 to EFCore9 #35117
    10.0.0
  • Index was out of range issue while migration #35116
  • `Entity type 'Entity.Addresses#Address' is mapped to JSON and has a navigation to a regular entity which is not the owner` #35115

Closed

  • Upgraded to .NET9 - Extension Methods of IQueryable<T> not translated when used as a sub/child query #35114
  • EF Core not saving all rows and misses some data for rows that are saved. #35097

PullRequests

Created

  • Set <LangVersion> to preview #35121
  • Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate #35120
  • Update to .NET9 SDK #35119
